# ui-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                   | Type                                              | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | Disabled state                | `boolean`                                         | `false`     |
| `fullWidth` | `full-width` | Full width button             | `boolean`                                         | `false`     |
| `loading`   | `loading`    | Loading state (shows spinner) | `boolean`                                         | `false`     |
| `size`      | `size`       | Button size                   | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                            | `'md'`      |
| `type`      | `type`       | Button type attribute         | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                 | `'button'`  |
| `variant`   | `variant`    | Button variant style          | `"outline" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "text"` | `'primary'` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                    | Type                      |
| ------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------- |
| `buttonClick` | Emitted when button is clicked | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |
